title: Leaving The Dungeon
body:
Leaving The Dungeon

Wanting to know the limit of his spiritual senses, Evan used his spiritual power to its maximum limit.

The range of his spiritual senses started to increase. Soon Evan was able to see the old man who was sleeping under the umbrella, but he didn't stop there and soon his spiritual senses covered around five kilometres of area.

Evan felt a little lightheaded after using his spiritual power to its maximum limit, but he was smiling widely after seeing the range of his spiritual senses

According to what he knew, the range of a normal A rank hunter's spiritual sense is around two to three kilometres.

He is not even an A ranker, but his range is already five kilometres which is more than an A rank hunter.

Feeling satisfied, Evan was about to withdraw his spiritual senses when he suddenly noticed a few people who were sitting in one of the corners of the dungeon area.
